plugins\/enedis\/plugin_info\/configurat.Afin de ne pas surcharger les serveurs E: In order not to overload the Enedis servers, the data is checked once an hour at a random minute

plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Indiquer le numéro de 14 caractères perm: Indicate the 14-character number to identify the delivery point whose data must be retrieved
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Indiquer le type de mesure qu'il faut ré: Indicate the type of measure to be recovered (consumption, production or both)
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Cocher la case pour utiliser le template: Check the box to use the widget template representing the Linky counter
plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Sélectionner la couleur de fond du templ: Select the background color of the widget template

plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Toutes les données sont à jour - désact: All data is up to date - disable automatic checking for today
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.L\\'identifiant du point de livraison (P: The delivery point identifier (PDL) must be entered
The delivery point identifier (PDL) must contain 14 characters

info.json.Récupérez les informations de consommati:
Retrieve the consumption information of your smart electricity meters from your Enedis customer account. All you need to do is authorize the sharing of data with Jeedom and indicate the identification number of the Delivery Point (PDL) concerned.

The plugin returns hourly, daily, monthly, annual measurements as well as the maximum power both in consumption and in production.
NB: The most recent data received by Enedis relate to the day before the current day
